attacks.hit: 10 negative energy damage, and after the attack the wraith teleports to and engages with one target it hit

traits.name: Flight
traits.description: Flight

traits.name: Ghostly
traits.description: This creature has resist damage 16+ to all damage (including holy damage) except force damage, which damages it normally. A wraith can move through solid objects, but it can’t end its movement inside them.

specials.name: Drain life
specials.description: The wraith heals half the damage it deals when it hits with a natural 18+ attack roll.

extras.name: Natural even hit
extras.description: The wyvern can make a deadly tail stinger attack during its next turn.

attacks.name: Deadly tail stinger
attacks.hit: 15 damage, and the target takes 10 ongoing poison damage (difficult save ends, 16+)

traits.name: Flight
traits.description: Flight

specials.name: Escalating poison
specials.description: Add the escalation die to the wyvern’s ongoing poison damage whenever that damage is dealt.

attacks.name: C: Puppeteer tentacles
attacks.hit: The target makes a basic attack against a target of the xombie egg swarm’s choice

traits.name: Swarm rush
traits.description: Once per battle as a move action, the egg swarm can pop free from each enemy engaged with it and take two move actions, but it must finish its move engaged with an enemy.

traits.name: Group ability
traits.description: For every four xombie egg swarms in the battle (round up), one of them can use puppeteer tentacles once during the battle.

specials.name: Corpse puppet
specials.description: If there is at least one intact corpse in the battle (say a star-mask cultist died), then once per battle part of the xombie egg swarm can burrow into it as a quick action, and it rises as a skull crab xombie at the start of the next round (roll initiative and give the new xombie a +10 initiative bonus for the shock of its arrival).

attacks.name: Claws that burrow under your skin

extras.name: Natural even hit
extras.description: The xombie spider is under the target’s skin. The target takes 8 damage if it disengages from the spider.

attacks.name: C: Chittering call
attacks.attack: +7 vs. MD (one nearby or faraway enemy)
attacks.hit: The target can’t willingly engage a xombie spider or any other spider (save ends). Creatures immune to fear are immune to this effect.

extras.name: Limited use
extras.description: 1/round, as a quick action. In addition, once a creature has saved against the effect, it can’t be targeted by chittering call attacks again this battle.

attacks.name: Tendril web
attacks.attack: +7 vs. PD (1d3 enemies engaged with it)
attacks.hit: The target is stuck (save ends); until the target saves, the xombie spider gains a +1 attack bonus against it

traits.name: Group ability
traits.description: For every three star-mask spiders in the battle (round up), one of them can use tendril web once during the battle.

attacks.name: Banner magic
attacks.attack: Roll 1d20 and 1d20 and use each roll (or a lower result of your choice) to determine one effect

attacks.name: False rally
attacks.attack: +8 vs. MD (1 nearby enemy with 15HP or fewer)
attacks.hit: The target is confused (hard save ends, 16+)

extras.name: Critical hit
extras.description: The target can now only save against the confusion with a natural 20 (or until the warbanner drops) and can’t flee if the rest of the PCs choose to do so.

traits.name: Designated bearer
traits.description: Once per round as a quick action, the warbanner can fly directly above a lower-level ally in its band and designate that ally as its bearer. Alternately, it can release itself from a bearer and fly free.

traits.name: Bearer beware
traits.description: While the warbanner has a bearer it moves with the bearer and is engaged by enemies that engage the bearer. The bearer is vulnerable to all attacks but it can use the escalation die.

traits.name: Conditional resist damage 16+
traits.description: As feral warbanner

traits.name: Flight
traits.description: As feral warbanner

traits.name: Mook morale
traits.description: Mooks fighting in the warbanner’s band gain a bonus to their hit points equal to the warbanner’s level (3).

attacks.name: Smash
attacks.hit: 20 damage, and the zombie can only attack using gutburst during its next turn

extras.name: Natural 16+
extras.description: Both the zombie and its target take 2d6 damage.

attacks.name: C: Gutburst
attacks.hit: The target takes 3 ongoing acid damage from a spray of stinking zombified gut juice. The zombie takes 1d6 damage.

attacks.name: C: Thrash
attacks.attack: +7 vs. PD (each enemy engaged with it)

traits.name: Headshot
traits.description: The first time an enemy crits the zombie, the beast must roll a save. If it succeeds, it takes normal crit damage. If it fails, it drops to 0 hp. A second crit just drops the thing.

specials.name: Ghastly thrashing
specials.description: When the zombie beast is first staggered, it makes a thrash attack as a free action.

extras.name: Natural 16+
extras.description: Both the zombie and its target take 1d4 damage!

traits.name: Headshot
traits.description: A critical hit against a zombie shuffler deals triple damage instead of the normal double damage for a crit.

extras.name: Natural even hit or miss
extras.description: Both the zombie and its target take 1d6 damage.

attacks.name: C: Curse
attacks.hit: The target is weakened until the start of the zombie’s next turn.

traits.name: Hand of the fallen
traits.description: When a melee attack drops one or more Silver Rose mooks, the hand of one of those zombies ends up severed from its owner and latched onto a nearby enemy. The afflicted creature is vulnerable to all attacks until the hand is removed, which takes a standard action by that creature or an ally next to them.

traits.name: Shot to the head
traits.description: When an attack drops this zombie and it had 2, 4, or 6 hp remaining, the attack deals the same amount of damage to another member of the mob. If this zombie has any other number of hit points left? No hit to the head.

traits.name: Mob rule
traits.description: The curse gains an attack bonus equal to the number of Silver Rose zombies in the battle.

specials.name: Curse of failure
specials.description: Each round, one zombie mook in the Silver Rose mob can make a curse attack as a quick action.
